5#ifndef V8_HEAP_CPPGC_JS_UNIFIED_HEAP_MARKING_STATE_INL_H_
6#define V8_HEAP_CPPGC_JS_UNIFIED_HEAP_MARKING_STATE_INL_H_
7
8#include <atomic>
9
10#include "include/v8-traced-handle.h"
11#include "src/base/logging.h"
12#include "src/handles/traced-handles.h"
13#include "src/heap/cppgc-js/unified-heap-marking-state.h"
14#include "src/heap/heap.h"
15#include "src/heap/mark-compact.h"
16#include "src/heap/marking-state-inl.h"
17#include "src/heap/marking-worklist-inl.h"
18#include "src/objects/objects-inl.h"
19
20namespace v8 {
21namespace internal {
22
23class BasicTracedReferenceExtractor final {
24 public:
25 static Address* GetObjectSlotForMarking(const TracedReferenceBase& ref) {
26 return const_cast<Address*>(
27 reinterpret_cast<const Address*>(ref.GetSlotThreadSafe()));
28 }
29};
30
31void UnifiedHeapMarkingState::MarkAndPush(
32 const TracedReferenceBase& reference) {
33 // The following code will crash with null pointer derefs when finding a
34 // non-empty `TracedReferenceBase` when `CppHeap` is in detached mode.
35 Address* traced_handle_location =
36 BasicTracedReferenceExtractor::GetObjectSlotForMarking(reference);
37 // We cannot assume that the reference is non-null as we may get here by
38 // tracing an ephemeron which doesn't have early bailouts, see
39 // `cppgc::Visitor::TraceEphemeron()` for non-Member values.
40 if (!traced_handle_location) {
41 return;
42 }
43 Tagged<Object> object =
44 TracedHandles::Mark(traced_handle_location, mark_mode_);
45 if (!IsHeapObject(object)) {
46 // The embedder is not aware of whether numbers are materialized as heap
47 // objects are just passed around as Smis.
48 return;
49 }
50 Tagged<HeapObject> heap_object = HeapObject::cast(object);
51 if (InReadOnlySpace(heap_object)) return;
52 if (!ShouldMarkObject(heap_object)) return;
53 if (marking_state_->TryMark(heap_object)) {
54 local_marking_worklist_->Push(heap_object);
55 }
56 if (V8_UNLIKELY(track_retaining_path_)) {
57 heap_->AddRetainingRoot(Root::kTracedHandles, heap_object);
58 }
59}
60
61bool UnifiedHeapMarkingState::ShouldMarkObject(
62 Tagged<HeapObject> object) const {
63 // Keep up-to-date with MarkCompactCollector::ShouldMarkObject.
64 if (V8_LIKELY(!has_shared_space_)) return true;
65 if (is_shared_space_isolate_) return true;
66 return !InAnySharedSpace(object);
67}
68
69} // namespace internal
70} // namespace v8
71
72#endif // V8_HEAP_CPPGC_JS_UNIFIED_HEAP_MARKING_STATE_INL_H_
